title: Virtual Simulation Course for Pulmonary Rehabilitation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Non-face-to-face education environment utilizing smartphone-based VR simulations and video content

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform three types of pulmonary rehabilitation exercises (breathing training, muscle strengthening, aerobic exercise)
Learners can identify and propose responses to 80% or more of symptom exacerbation signals in pulmonary rehabilitation patients
Learners can create personalized rehabilitation plans for patients in VR simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
